result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Sean C. Heath

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: body
Bench Warrant

Attorney Kara M Rolf in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Rolf states DE was to call in today.  Atty Rolf provides phone number for the Court to call.  Court instructs Atty Rolf to contact DE and have him call in if that was the arrangment.  Off the record, Atty Rolf attempts to contact DE but is unable to.  State requests warrant.  Based on non-appearance, court authorized warrant.  FPT and JT are canceled.
Return date on August 7, 2017 at 01:00 pm.
Attorney Kara M Rolf in court.  Kevin R. Calkins appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Rolf has not had contact with DE.  Return date scheduled for August 7, 2017 at 01:00 pm.
Plea hearing on July 31, 2017 at 01:00 pm.

Attorney Kara M Rolf in court.  Linda Ann Hoffman appeared for the State of Wisconsin and Intern, Emma B.  Atty Rolf advises State is ok with DE not being booked and taking plea without DE present.  Matter to be resolved by DPA.  Plea hearing scheduled for July 31, 2017 at 01:00 pm.
Status hearing on July 27, 2017 at 01:00 pm.

Attorney Kara M Rolf in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DE has never been booked.  State states have active victims.  Atty. Rolf states will do over phone.  Court has concerns about DE appearing for booking.  Status hearing scheduled for July 27, 2017 at 01:00 pm.
on S.H.
Cover Letter from Atty. Tsai
Status hearing on May 23, 2017 at 01:00 pm.
Final pre-trial on September 5, 2017 at 01:00 pm.
Jury trial on September 13, 2017 at 08:30 am.
Attorney Puck Tsai in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Reset with Br. 1.  Bond continues.
Return date on July 28, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

Attorney Puck Tsai in court.  Dennis Joseph Ryan and intern Cody M. appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty. Tsai spoke with Atty. Calkins and want to set up a phone plea/sentencing.  Set up with Br. 1.  DE is a resident of Ohio.  State has no objection.  Return date scheduled for July 28, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
Return date on July 14, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

Attorney Puck Tsai in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Resident of Ohio, close to resolution of a DPA.  Need another chat with DA Calkins.  Plea by phone. Bond continues.  Return date scheduled for July 14, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

Pre-trial conference on May 27, 2016 at 09:30 am.
Return date on June 10, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

Attorney Puck Tsai in court.  Michael X. Albrecht appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty. Tsai close to DPA to resolve case, need to speak with Atty. Calkins, 3 week reset or PTC.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 27, 2016 at 09:30 am.  Return date scheduled for June 10, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
Return date on May 4, 2016 at 01:00 pm.

Attorney Puck Tsai in court.  Michael X. Albrecht appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Client from Ohio, dealing with DOT.  Reset for 45 days for resolution.  Bond continues.  Return date scheduled for May 4, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
Return date at 03-17-2016 01:00 pm

Attorney Puck Tsai in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Tsai advises matter will likely resolve.  DOT issues still pending. Bond continues.  Return date scheduled for March 17, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
Return date at 02-23-2016 01:00 pm

Attorney Puck Tsai in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  DPA pending.  Awaiting medical information and restitution totals.  Request 30 day reset.  State has no objection.  Bond continues.  Return date scheduled for February 23, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
Return date at 01-22-2016 01:00 pm

Attorney Puck Tsai in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Request 30 day reset. Matters being resolved.  Request more time.  Defendant resides out of state.  Bond continues.  Return date scheduled for January 22, 2016 at 01:00 pm.
Booking by 12/10/15

Pre-trial conference at 12-04-2015 09:15 am.
Return date at 12-16-2015 01:00 pm.

Attorney Puck Tsai in court.  Michael X. Albrecht appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Auth filed and approved.  Attorney Tsai received CC and waived reading.  File set for pre-trial conference/return date. $350.00 SIGNATURE bond set.  Special bond conditions as follows:  Booking on December 16, 2015 at 1 p.m.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for December 4, 2015 at 09:15 am.  Return date scheduled for December 16, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
